projects.text: This project envolves AngularJS with Controllers, services and directive, with GETting info from external API.
This project was to mimk the Paz site, with all it's features, styles and images, please be sure to click the 'contact us' link
A simple registartion form is always in use, all critic info is validated i.e correct e-mail, valid password and re-entered password validation

projects.header: Wile E. Coyote Road Runner - Tribute Page
projects.text: A screen size responsive tribute page for the unforgettable Wile E. Coyote and his nemesis the Road Runner
A screen size responsive page with articles nicely layout
A cat book page demonstrates bootstrap use with signup modal, jumbotron, cards and carousel

projects.text: Hebrew Page with Header, side-dropdown-menu, articles and a footer - using float technique
